subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is adding flexibility in hopes of keeping teams properly seeded. For instance, conference foes that played once during the season can meet as early as the Round of 32.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. is adding flexibility in hopes of keeping teams properly seeded. For instance, conference foes that played once during the season can meet as early as the Round of 32.
